hero.name: Juan Morales
hero.title: Software Engineer
hero.subtitle: Building beautiful and functional web experiences

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a Software Engineer with 6+ years of experience in web development using React as a framework. I have also worked on mobile and backend projects in parallel. Experienced in developing complex features for startups and large companies, primarily in the USA, across diverse industries such as e-commerce, food delivery, freight logistics, and HR management.
about.passion: I'm passionate about understanding how things work, whether in technology, music, physics, or design. I find motivation in creating and appreciating well-engineered, functional, and beautiful solutions.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: Part of the team handling climate surveys in the platform. Created data visualizations, with the most remarkable being a Heat map that allows admin users to analyze answers from end users. Collaborated in the internal design system and periodically handle weekly releases.

jobs.title: Software Engineer
jobs.description: Software Engineer and Mentor with 2+ years of remote experience at a Chicago-based Freight Hub Tech company. Specialized in front-end development with React, micro web apps, and monorepo strategy. Responsible for UI implementation and maintaining a NestJS-based Backend For Frontend (BFF) project. Actively mentored colleagues and contributed to the success of the account supply chain visibility project.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Using Aura and Lightning Components, was part of the front-end team for a Texas-based company that built plugins and extensions for Salesforce.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Frontend development using React and modern web technologies for various client projects.

education.title: Education
education.description: Graduated with software development emphasis. Final project focused on data visualization and analysis, building a web application to display results from lipids analysis. Data was collected from biological samples and analyzed with Python using multi and univariate data analysis techniques. Data visualization was engineered with D3 over a React application made with Next.js. Collaborated with the University of Antioquia's Neurobiology Research Group.

items.title: Frontend Leader
items.description: Leading frontend development for a startup using blockchain technology to create NFTs from musical instruments. Collaborate in product thinking and UI/UX design in my free time.

items.title: Mentor
items.description: Trained a colleague needing more React experience. Designed a curriculum, implemented rubrics, and established a methodology that best suited the mentee's needs.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions. Feel free to reach out!
